// Initialize the result array
export const arraySplicer=(array,splicer)=>{const subarraySizes=Array.from({length:Math.ceil(array.length/splicer)});return subarraySizes.reduce(acc=>{const subarray=array.splice(0,splicer);acc.push(subarray);return acc;},[]);};export function formatCurrencyUZS(amount){const formatter=new Intl.NumberFormat('uz-UZ',{style:'currency',currency:'UZS',minimumFractionDigits:0,maximumFractionDigits:2});return formatter.format(amount);}
